title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Complete Design project on a building complex covering various aspects of Civil Engineering; Complete planning of the complex â Architectural plans, Elevations and sections, structural design of the complex, Structural detailing of the complex, Water supply system for each component of the complex with appropriate provisions of overhead water tanks for supply of water, Sewerage system, Road network in and around the complex
